results.name: Fixed point of the morphism 0 -> 01, 1 -> 02, 2 -> 03, 3 -> 01.
formula: a(n) = 0 for odd n; a(n) == A007814(n) (mod 3) for even n. - _Jianing Song_, Sep 21 2018
xref: Positions of 0 or 3: A191257; positions of 1: A067368; positions of 2: A213258.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, May 28 2011
